effects.effect: Deal Hits to 1 target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone.
Deal Hits to 1 target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone.  Reduce your Strain by 1.
Deal Hits to 2 targets in your Current or an Adjacent Zone.  Reduce your Strain by 2.
Score 2+ Hits to have 1 target in your Current Zone gains Dazed.
Score 2+ Hits to have up to 2 targets in your Current Zone gain Dazed.
Score 2+ Hits to have up to Hits targets in your Current Zone gain Dazed.
Deal Hits to 1 target's Grit, ignoring all Defenses.
Deal Hits to all target's Grit, ignoring all Defenses.
When a target you can see in your Current Zone dies, restore Hits to your Grit.

spells.name: Arc Lightning
spells.effect: Choose 3 targets you can see in your Current Zone. Deal 1 Hit to each target.

threshold.effect: Choose 3 targets you can see in your Current Zone.  Deal 3 Hits the first target, 2 Hits to the second target, & 1 Hit to the third.

spells.name: Arrest
spells.effect: One target you can see in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Restrained x, where x is equal to Hits.

threshold.effect: One target you can see in your Current or an Adjacent Zone gains Restrained x, where x is equal to Hits +2.

spells.name: Asphyxiate
spells.effect: You pull the air from the lungs of one target you can see in your Current Zone. They gain Dazed and Vulnerable x, where x is equal to Hits.

threshold.effect: You pull the air from the lungs of one target you can see in your Current Zone. They gain Stunned and Vulnerable x, where x is equal to Hits.

techniques.name: Aether Spike
techniques.effect: Send a bolt of cosmic energy at a taget, scoring 1 Hit.

threshold.effect: Send a bolt of cosmic energy at a taget, scoring 2 Hits.

techniques.name: Aether Gust
techniques.effect: Send a wave of energy outward, pushing a number of targets in your Current Zone equal to Hits in the results set to the Adjacent Zone closest to them.

threshold.effect: Send a wave of energy outward, pushing all targets in your Current Zone to the Adjacent Zone closest to them.

techniques.name: Aether Tunnel
techniques.effect: Open a cosmic tunnel between your Current Zone and a linear Zone up to 2 Zones adjacent.  You and your allies can use the tunnel to Shift to the tunnel's endpoints without incurring Hazard.

threshold.effect: The current Timer expires.  The next Timer is set to 4.

techniques.name: Essence Flux
techniques.effect: When one of your allies you can see suffers Hits from an attack, you momentarily send them to the Aether, reducing the Hits they take by Hits in the result set.

threshold.effect: When one of your allies you can see suffers Hits from an attack, you momentarily send them to the Aether, reducing the Hits they take by Hits in the result set.  Create 1 Advantage in the target ally's Current Zone.

techniques.name: Invoke Fire
techniques.effect: Deal 3 Hits to one target in your Current or Adjacent Zone.

threshold.effect: Deal 3 Hits to up to 2 targets in your Current or Adjacent Zone.
Deal 3 Hits to up to 3 targets in your Current or Adjacent Zone.

techniques.name: Kindle
techniques.effect: Deal X Hits to one target in your Current Zone, where X is equal to . . .

techniques.name: Immolation
techniques.effect: One target you can see in your Current Zone gains Aura 2 as you wrap them in flames.  They suffer 2 Hits to their Grit on each of their turns while this Aura persists, and they add +2 Bonus Hits inin fire damage when they use Strike or Martial Arts.

threshold.effect: One target you can see in your Current Zone gains Aura 2 as you wrap them in flames.  They suffer 2 Hits to their Grit on each of their turns while this Aura persists, and they add +3 Bonus Hits inin fire damage when they use Strike or Martial Arts.

techniques.name: Rending Flames
techniques.effect: Deal 3 Hits to one target in your Current or Adjacent Zone.  If that target dies, deal 2 Hits to another target in the same Zone.

threshold.effect: Deal 5 Hits to one target in your Current or Adjacent Zone.  If that target dies, deal 3 Hits to another target in the same Zone.
